text: Zygaspis quadrifrons, also known as the Kalahari dwarf worm lizard or Kalahari round-snouted worm lizard, is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in southern Africa. ==References== Category:Zygaspis Category:Reptiles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Zygaspis quadrifrons
